title: What to know about the Vatican meeting on the future of the Catholic Church
description: Delegates from across the globe are converging on Vatican City for the opening of an unprecedented assembly seen as part of the broadest consultation on the direction of the faith since the 1960s

title: E.U. diplomats rally in Kyiv as cracks grow in West’s support
description: In Washington, lawmakers are bickering over Ukraine aid. Scratch beneath the surface in Europe, too, and you can find doubts about indefinite commitments to Kyiv.

title: As China arrives with a splash in Honduras, the U.S. wrings its hands
description: Despite energetic warnings from the Biden administration, Honduras has established diplomatic relations with China, breaking its decades-long ties with Taiwan.

title: U.N. authorizes Kenya-led force for Haiti; key questions remain
description: Still to be worked out: The number of troops, when they will be deployed, their rules of engagement and the exit strategy.

title: Amid liberal revolt, Pope Francis signals openness to blessings for gay couples
description: Francis has raised the hopes of progressives — and stoked the fears of traditionalists — that the church might move in the direction of what Germany is doing.

title: Grizzly bear kills couple at Canada’s Banff National Park
description: The bear that killed common-law partners and their dog at the popular park in Alberta was euthanized.

title: Israel’s secular-religious divide highlighted in holiday incidents
description: The weeks-long holiday period ends Friday, and many leaders have beseeched Israelis on all sides to act with greater tolerance. Those pleas have largely fallen on deaf ears.

title: Bedbugs torment Paris ahead of 2024 Olympics: ‘No one is safe’
description: Apparent footage of the insects on public transit has gone viral, with one French official saying an action plan is urgently needed “against this scourge.”

title: The legacy of a horse-riding warrior princess gallops on in West Africa
description: Burkina Faso’s horse culture has endured even as the country has been wracked by jihadist violence.

title: Ukraine live briefing: With U.S. aid uncertain, Zelensky vows to fight Russia ‘as long as it takes’
description: The Ukrainian leader made the comments in a defiant veterans day speech, against the backdrop of wavering commitment among some Republicans to fund the war effort.

title: Nightclub fire in Spain kills at least 13
description: Authorities are investigating the cause of a blaze that started at the Fonda Milagros nightclub in the city of Murcia before spreading to adjoining venues.
